org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSFileOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSFileOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class EncFSFileOutputStream
extends FilterOutputStream
    FilterOutputStream abstraction that allows writing encrypted data to a file on an EncFS volume.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EncFSFileOutputStream(EncFSFile encfsFile, long inputLength)
      Creates an EncFSFileOutputStream to write encrypted data to a file under and EncFS volume

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream

        close, flush, write, write, write

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncFSFileOutputStream

        public EncFSFileOutputStream(EncFSFile encfsFile,
                     long inputLength)
                      throws IOException,
                             EncFSUnsupportedException,
                             EncFSCorruptDataException
        Creates an EncFSFileOutputStream to write encrypted data to a file under and EncFS volume
        Parameters:
        encfsFile - EncFSFile to open an output stream to
        inputLength - Length of the input file that will be written to this output stream. Note that this parameter is optional if using EncFSLocalFileProvider, but some network based storage API's require knowing the file length in advance.
        Throws:
        IOException
        EncFSUnsupportedException
        EncFSCorruptDataException
